tags: None
review: Easy, friendly, proper feedback. Helpful and detailed clear explanation of the situation. Would recommend again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a broken tooth from 20 years ago. It happened when my permanent teeth were coming out, I fell down and broke my front incisors. The impact was such large it not only broke one of the front tooth but also it came out of the set.I was bullied in my childhood because of this uneven broken front tooth. I went to a few local and government hospitals but none could fix my teeth after several attempts. Slowly all the negativity and hatred went away, and the broken tooth became a part of me. Every now and then someone would make fun of my teeth, obviously I would feel bad and stop smiling. I was not proud of my smile.One day I heard about Dr Rupesh, and booked an appointment with him. When I met him, it  was probably 2-3 months before my marriage. Looking at my teeth he said, he is confident that he can fix it. I never felt so relieved. I did everything he said, and suddenly after around 2 months, he actually fixed it. I can never be more thankful to a doctor. He gave me my smile back! Words can't describe my emotions. I laughed like anything in my marriage and all of it was possible because of Dr Rupesh.Thank You Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had taken our 9 year old son to this clinic when the Composite Restoration of his incisors broke during the Puja holidays. As it happens in Kolkata during Puja's, all dental clinics were closed and our sons Pedodontist was out of town. We were apprehensive of not finding a Pedodontist, but Dr Rupesh despite being an Orthodontist, handled our son quite well and put our fears at ease. He listened, examined and explained the pros and cons of the treatment very nicely. Dr Rupesh did the Composite Restoration with finesse and skillfully handled all the complaints of our child. He answered all our queries related to our sons dental management very patiently. The clinic Implanting Smiles is a relatively new 2 chair group practice with most dental specialties and young dynamic dentists. We interacted with the 3 dentists present during our visit and all of them were a pleasure to talk to. We felt the dental team had a consultative team approach to supporting the patient experience which we rarely see in the private sector. Finding it open on a holiday when most clinics had closed speaks about the clinics work ethos. The decor and feel of the clinic is also modern and aesthetic adding to the patient experience. Surprisingly we found the pricing to be cost effective too. Thank you Dr Rupesh and team Implanting Smiles. Kudos and all the best!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was good experience. I was pretty terrified with the idea that what if infection is deep and extraction needs to be done and getting a good doctor for my dental procedure was my first preference ( I am happy that I chose him). He handled both the RCTs efficiently. It has been one week after the treatment and I am more than satisfied. He also helped me in solving the problem of jaw not fitting properly which happened with my previous dental procedure with some other doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is more of doing  procedure instead of treating my existing problem. Didnt provide any solution or medicine for my gum issue. Only asked to do scaling of teeth.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My daughter, 22 had done her bracing for malaligned teeth some eight years back but it give the desired result. In 2018 end I consulted Dr Rupesh Singh who took up the challenge reminding that at this age it becomes difficult to pull the teeth back in position. It took some two years plus but the procedure was successful and she got back her smile. It was totally different experience from the old one which was somewhat painful but the technology used by Dr Singh was painless and hygenic. 
Dr Singh is very friendly and he deserves my congratulations.

The Dental surgeon is really good at his work , he had performed the surgery taking all covid precautions and I was super satisfied with his mode of treatment. tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Rupesh  Kumar Singh for my tooth pain. I waited almost 50 min. Something was stuck in between my teeth. He checked and told that one of my tooth was broken but nothing can be done for that . I should change one of my root canal  tooth's Crown.He took  an x-ray  and scaled my one of my teeth to check . He gave only one ointment. He told if pain doesn't control visit I will change the Crown. For this small thing he charged800 Rs. This is really too much for a small tooth problem . That's why I didn't   visit him again. Costly Dentist. I will consult another Dentist  .
reply_text:
Mam thanks for writing to us. I am really sorry for making you wait as it took longer to resolve the issues of patient previous to you. We will try to look into this issue and will certainly make it better.
Mam as far as cost is concerned it included consultancy fee, IOPA X-ray and ultrasonic scaling of one quadrant. It also include follow up charges for a month. We called you for follow up but you did not reply. Replying and telling us your concern could have helped. I feel helpless if you do not come for follow up.

tags: Wait time,
review: I have booked appointment at 5 pm .I reached there at within 5:08 pm, but Dr. was not available. After waiting till 5:40 I left. Dr came at 6 pm then they gave me a call to come. If dr is busy for any reason, pkease arrange the appointment accordingly.
reply_text:
Thanks for giving a feedback. I reached late because of heavy traffic that day and I am sorry for inconvenience.
 But it is wrong to write half truth over here. It won't help us to serve you better. You should have mentioned about appointment we arranged on your desired time in that same week.
   We at Implanting Smile always try to give our best and try to solve any issue with patient genuinely and sincerely.
   Half truth is no better than a lie. Please be truthful to yourself and others.
